name: Padre Nuestro
description:
The game is set to follow characters whose stories are tied together by a bioweapon which targets the monster DNA inside human being.  This project follows Phillip and is a re-invisioning of a Red Herring, my first game. Link Below:

Controls:

Directional Pad -->movement

Z key --> Attack

X key--> Dash

C key --> interact
